post_body: "helicopter" hovering over one spot of anderlecht for the past 15 minutes

comment.body: Also wondering what's up. My son thinks it's Santa.

Schietpartij in Anderlecht: 1 dode, gewapende verdachte op de vlucht
https://www.vrt.be/vrtnws/nl/2024/12/22/schietpartij-in-anderlecht-2-gewonden-gewapende-verdachte-op-d/

There has been heavy police deployment at Aumale.  
The helicopter has been hovering the same area since a few minutes after the police arrived, so probably related, but I do not know what happened at Aumale per se.
I have also seen it! Seems to be gone now
you live behind the old atlas brewery?
I heard it too. Was wondering what it was.
Like you guys never seen a drone in-flight before??
Sushi thief capture efforts have been ramped up!

It makes helicopter sounds... What is it? 

A helicopter! 

Those aliens/secret UFO's thoughts spread like a disease. People don't think or something?

I came here for a drone comment ahahah thx

theres always a slimy little redditor like yours in the comments of posts like this either answer with a neutral tone or dont answer at all, when did i mention ufo in my post? as long as the post doesn't violate any rules and isnt spam you just look like u got a stick up yours
Honestly, your use of " " made me also think you were doubting this to be a helicopter.
comon be honest you were hinting this might be a drone

My apologies then, I've just seen so much people questioning the sky for a minute. It looked like this was just one of them.

To answer your question: most likely a police helicopter, this happened a while back in October where a helicopter was also hoovering over the muntplein.
